short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get the exact high UV periods of the day based on your location and only apply sunscreen when needed.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get accurate information on the high UV periods of the day based on your location, helping you stay informed and apply sunscreen only when necessary. 

This extension provides real-time UV index data along with the maximum UV index of the day, highlighting times when UV exposure is at its peak or when the UV index exceeds 3, which is the threshold recommended for sun protection.
